content: Hi, I am looking for guidance/suggestions on which UI framework you think would best suitable for building up a reusable smart on FHIR UI app that meets the SDC (Structure Data Capture) specification. I am looking at Vue JS, can any one provide your thoughts if they have already done work on these lines and their experiences with other popular frameworks like Angular & React Js
Check out the tools here: https://lhcforms.nlm.nih.gov/ - some tooling similar what you are describing. There is also a #questionnaire stream here for SDC-specific stuff as well.

Always best to use what you know.
There's also a #javascript channel too for that type of discussion.

I've personally done an implementation in jquery for Telstra Health, the lhcforms is in angular (x2) and I know of another one in angular too.
I believe the Beda Software implementation is in REACT.
I started personally learnijg VueJS over the Christmas holidays and am giving it a go there too.
